bannedDependencies.message: use jakarta.activation:jakarta.activation-api or com.sun.activation:jakarta.activation instead of javax.activation
Remove xml-apis and xerces and latest versions provided by Java core
Remove apis not renamed to jakarta
Do not include uber jars, use individual sub jars instead. This will clash

bannedDependencies.excludes:
a javax.servlet:javax.servlet-api
javax.enterprise:cdi-api javax.inject:javax.inject javax.json:javax.json-api javax.json.bind:javax.json.bind-api org.glassfish:javax.json org.glassfish:javax.el javax.persistence:javax.persistence-api javax.persistence:persistence-api
javax.security.enterprise:javax.security.enterprise-api
javax.servlet:servlet-api:*:jar:compile javax.servlet:servlet-api:*:jar:runtime javax.servlet:servlet-api:*:jar:test
javax.transaction:jta javax.transaction:javax.transaction-api
com.sun.xml.bind:jaxb-core javax.xml.bind:jaxb-api:jar
javax.websocket:javax.websocket-api
org.jvnet:mimepull
